title: Hyderabad wakes up to sudden thundershowers, heavy rainfall - The News Minute
content:
1. Hyderabad wakes up to sudden thundershowers, heavy rainfall  The News Minute
  2. Watch: Boats Out On Hyderabad Roads As Heavy Rain Leads To Waterlogging  NDTV
  3. Heavy rains lash parts of Hyderabad; thundershowers likely in Telangana  The Indian Express
  4. Hyderabad witnesses sudden thundershowers, heavy rainfall  The News Minute
  5. Heavy rains in Hyderabad; many areas report waterlogging  Times of India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Hyderabad woke up to sudden thundershowers and heavy rains on Wednesday, May 4, bringing much-needed respite amid soaring temperatures in the city. Parts of the city saw an unprecedented rainfall of 72.8 mm in one hour, and after the sudden downpour, many areas saw waterlogging and minor inundation. Trees have also fallen in many areas, reports say, and many residents have alleged that civic officials have not reached the spot to clear the waterlogged streets. In one area, staff employees of a private hospital were seen trying to push out the water that had collected inside their premises.
